General.Name: CPFL Energia S.A
General.Description: CPFL Energia S.A. generates, transmits, distributes, and commercializes electricity to residential, industrial, and commercial customers in Brazil. The company was founded in 1912 and is based in Campinas, Brazil. CPFL Energia S.A. is a subsidiary of State Grid Brazil Power Participações S.A.
General.Address: Rua Jorge Figueiredo CorrEa, no 1.632, Campinas, SP, Brazil, 13087-397
